patthana15.34:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.34:2.1_0: Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.34:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
